data.text: Bɨ mɨlep okok kɨlop ma ag gɨnɨmɨn. Nap nad ke ak tek, agñɨ tep gɨnɨmɨn. Bɨ pɨlaj okok kɨlop, mam nad ke ak tek, agñɨ tep gɨnɨmɨn.
Bin mɨlep okok kɨlop, nanɨm nad ke ak tek, agñɨ tep gɨnɨmɨn. Bin pɨlaj okok kɨlop, nanay nad ke ak tek, agñɨ tep gɨl, kɨli ayɨp mɨdɨl nɨgtep gɨl, God wɨdɨn mɨdup ne adek sɨŋak teplep yenɨmɨn.
Bin kaŋɨl yɨmgeptek mɨdebal okok, kɨlop gos tep nɨŋɨd, kod mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨn.

5.4 Mat 15.4, Epe 6.1-2, 1 Ti 2.3 Pen bin kaŋɨl olap ñapay ñɨ apɨs ne ogɨnap yenɨgel, kɨlop yomɨl agenɨmɨn, kɨli nop kod mɨdtep gɨnɨgel. Wog anɨb ak wog awl yɨbɨl, God wɨdɨn mɨdup adek ne sɨŋak. Wog kɨli ned adek ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, nonɨm nap akaŋ, napɨs nased okok kɨlop yɨmagɨlɨlak tek, pen kod mɨdtep gɨnɨgel. Anɨgenɨgabal, God nop tep gɨnɨgab.
5.5 Luk 2.37, 18.1, 18.7, Apo 26.7, 1 Ko 7.32 Bin kaŋɨl yɨmgeptek mɨdeb ak, God yɨp kod yenɨgab agɨl gos nɨŋɨd, subnab maynab ayaŋ God nop agɨlɨg, yɨp gɨñaŋ agɨl God nop agnɨgɨlɨg nep mɨdeb.
Pen bin kaŋɨl mɨñmɨñ gɨ ajup ak, kɨm mɨdebin agɨl gos nɨgup ak pen, nab ne kumɨl tek mɨdeb.
Takaw anɨb awl, binɨb okok kɨlop age, kɨli gɨtep gɨnɨgel nɨm, binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop ma nɨŋɨd ag gɨnɨgabal.

5.8 Ais 58.7, Mat 18.17, Gal 6.10, Tat 1.16 Pen binɨb an, binɨb ne ke yɨbɨl okok kod mɨdtep ma gɨl, binɨb ne jɨj nokom okok abe kod mɨdtep ma gup ak, chɨn nopun, ne Klays nop gos ma nɨŋɨd sawl gɨl nɨm, anɨgɨl gup ak. Binɨb Klays nop gos ma nepal okok, kɨli anɨgɨl ma gɨpal. Kɨli binɨb kɨli okok kɨlop tap ogɨnap ñɨl kod mɨdebal. Anɨb ak binɨb Klays nop gos ma nepal okok kɨli gɨ tɨmel gɨpal ak pen, binɨb an ned Klays nop gos nɨgup ak pen binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdtep ma gup ak, ne gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gup.
Bin kaŋɨl anɨb okok yɨb kɨlop gɨlɨnɨg, bin anɨb ak tek nɨŋɨd gɨlɨnɨmɨn. Sap yɨb ne 60 yonɨmuŋ ak nɨŋɨd, yɨb nop gɨlɨnɨmɨn. Pen bin bɨne nokom olap mɨdɨl, kumnɨmuŋ ak nɨŋɨd, yɨb nop gɨlɨnɨmɨn.

5.10 Hib 13.2 Bin yɨb ne teplep yɨbɨl, wog okok mɨdupsek keke gɨtep yɨbɨl gup ak nɨŋɨd, yɨb nop gɨlɨnɨmɨn. Wog teplep ne ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Ñapay ne ke kod mɨdtep gɨl, binɨb okok nɨb okok nɨb ownɨgel ak, ag dap kal mɨgan ne lɨl tap mɨdup ñɨtep gup. God binɨb ne okok, tob kɨlop okok ñɨg pak ñɨtep gɨl,5.10 Nɨbi Jon 13.1-17 nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Bɨlel, kɨli anɨgɨl gelɨgɨpal. Binɨb okok nɨb okok nɨb apelɨgɨpal ak, sɨlkul dayday tob kɨlop okok dolɨgup. Anɨb ak, binbɨ ogɨnap kal nad apel, tob sɨlkul dayday kɨlop okok ñɨg pakñelɨgɨpan. Wog anɨgep okok, binɨb wog gɨñeb kɨli ak anɨgɨl gelɨgɨpal. Jisas pen, bɨne okok kɨlop anɨgɨl agup, Nɨbi ke anɨgɨl bɨ ogɨnap wog gɨñeb kɨli ak yenɨmɨb agup. Matyu 20.25-28 nɨgɨnɨmɨb. binɨb koslam mɨdɨl gos pal lɨg mɨdebal okok kɨlop dɨtep gɨl, wog anɨb ak ke okok mɨdupsek wog teplep yɨbɨl gup ak, yɨb nop gɨlɨnɨmɨn.

Pen bin kaŋɨl pɨlaj nep mɨdebal okok, yɨb kɨlop ma gɨlɨnɨmɨn. Chɨn nopun, Klays wog ak gɨnɨgabun agɨnɨgabal ak pen, mɨd dad amɨl, bɨ kɨdek dun agɨl gos nɨŋɨd, Klays wog ak yɨlɨk nɨŋɨd bɨ kɨdeyɨl dɨnɨgabal.
Dɨnɨgabal anɨb ak tek, takaw kɨli ke ned aglɨlak ak, takaw anɨb ak tɨbɨlɨkɨl mɨŋel awl dɨnɨgabal.

5.13 2 Te 3.11 Pen tap ogɨnap sek anɨgɨl gɨpal. Kɨli tap ogɨnap abe yɨlɨk nɨŋɨd, yokɨp kal ak kal ak gɨñub ajɨpal. Kɨli pen yɨlɨk gup anɨb ak nep ma gɨpal, tap okok kuŋay nep gɨpal. Kɨli takaw ñɨg lɨl, takaw yepɨs anɨgɨpal anɨgɨpal agɨlɨg mɨdebal. Takaw okok kuŋay yɨbɨl apal, chɨn agep tek ma mɨdeb.

5.14 1 Ko 7.9 Anɨb ak bin kaŋɨl pɨlaj nep mɨdebal okok, bɨ kɨdeyɨl dɨl, ñapay tɨkɨl, kal kɨli ke wog gɨl kod mɨdtep gɨnɨgel agɨl gos nepin. Kɨli anɨgenɨgabal, binɨb chɨnop mɨlɨk nepal okok, chɨnop agjunɨgel tek ma lɨnɨgab.
Pen chɨn nopun, bin kaŋɨl pɨlaj nep mɨdebal okok, ogɨnap kanɨb tep ak kelɨgɨl, Satan nop kɨdek gɨpal.

Pen bin olap Klays nop gos lɨnɨgup ak, bin kaŋɨl ne ogɨnap kɨlop kod mɨdtep gɨnɨmuŋ. Anɨgenɨgab, bin kaŋɨl okok keke binɨb kɨli ak keke kod yenɨgel, binɨb God yɨl okok koslam gep tek ma gɨnɨgabal. Pen binɨb God yɨl okok, kɨli bin kaŋɨl yɨmgeptek mɨdebal okok kɨlop, kod mɨdtep gɨnɨgabal.

Bɨ Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdɨl, wog gɨtep gɨpal okok, kɨlop yɨb awl yɨbɨl ñɨl, kab kɨlop ogɨnap sek ñɨtep gɨnɨmɨb. Pen bɨ kɨli ogɨnap kɨles gɨl God takaw jɨj ak apal akaŋ, binɨb okok kɨlop agñɨbal okok, gɨpal gɨpal anɨb ak tek, kɨlop ned nɨŋɨd yɨb awl yɨbɨl ñɨl, kab kɨlop ogɨnap sek ñɨtep gɨnɨmɨb.
5.18 Lo 25.4, Mat 10.10, Luk 10.7, 1 Ko 9.9 Buk Baybol agɨl tɨkak ak nopun. Pen anɨb agak,

Bɨ olap nep apɨl agɨnɨmuŋ, Bɨ Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdep anɨb ak, anɨgɨl anɨgɨl tap tɨmel gup agonɨmuŋ ak, ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨn. Bɨ omɨŋal akaŋ, omɨŋal nokom pen nɨŋɨd apɨl agenɨgabal, nɨŋɨd apal tek lup agɨl, nɨgɨnɨmɨn.

5.20 Lo 13.11, Gal 2.11, 2.14, Epe 5.11, Tat 1.13 Pen bɨ Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdebal ogɨnap, tap si tap tɨmel genɨgel, kɨlop tɨmud wukɨnɨmɨn. Binɨb okok mɨdupsek nɨg mɨdelaknɨŋ, kɨlop tɨmud wukɨnɨmɨn. Anɨgenɨgaban, ogɨnap pɨlɨkɨl ma gɨnɨgabal.

Takaw agesɨpin anɨb awl, anɨb anɨb gɨnɨmɨn agesɨpin ak, yokɨp ma agebin. God ayɨp, Klays Jisas ayɨp, ensel aglep ne okok ayɨp kɨli nɨg mɨdelaknɨŋ, nep anɨgɨnɨmɨn takaw awl agebin. Pen bɨnonɨm nak okok sek, bɨ nak okok sek, kɨlop nep gɨtep ma gɨnɨmɨn. Kɨlop gɨpan tek, binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop gɨñɨnɨmɨn.

5.22 Apo 6.6, 13.3, 1 Ti 4.14, 2 Jo 11 Pen bɨ God wog gep olap dɨnɨg, nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨl, nop ñɨn dɨ mɨdɨlɨg agɨnɨmɨn. Bɨ anɨb okok, ogɨnap tap si tap tɨmel genɨgel, nad ayɨp ma gɨnɨmɨn. Mel. Nad ke suŋtep nep yenɨmɨn.
Pen nep mɨnek mɨnek tap gɨl, kogmeg gup ak, ñɨg anep ma ñɨŋɨnɨmɨn. Ñɨg wayn sɨkol ogɨnap sek ñɨbe suŋ lɨnɨmuŋ.
Bɨ ogɨnap tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal ak mɨseŋ lup. Ak tek ak chɨn nopun, tap kɨli gɨpal anɨb okok tɨmel yɨbɨl gup. Bɨ ogɨnap pen tap si tap tɨmel gɨl we gɨpal ak, kɨdek mɨseŋ lɨnɨgab.
Anɨb ak tek, binɨb ogɨnap tap gɨtep gɨpal ak, abe mɨseŋ lup. Pen gɨtep gɨpal ak ogɨnap kasek mɨseŋ ma lek, pel we gɨl yonɨmuŋ tek ma lup.
